sentences.sentence: Laparoscopic surgical procedures were of no marked influence on ventilatory function.
sentences.translation: 结论腹腔镜外科手术对肺通气功能无明显影响。

sentences.sentence: However, some patients do not respond well to conventional ventilatory support, further complicating the treatment.
sentences.translation: 但常规性的通气支持对有些病人的作用不大，使治疗的复杂性进一步加大。

sentences.sentence: We analysed the influence of aging on each parameter of ventilatory function with the method of cross-section study.
sentences.translation: 以横向年龄分组的方法分析了年龄对通气功能各参数的影响。
